abstract.t: At the IETF 77 Clouds Bar BoF, it was suggested that an internet draft on survey of standard organizations and working groups that are focusing on cloud-based systems and services be prepared. The objective is to take a snapshot of industry activities related to cloud features and functions for the purpose of creating a gap analysis. This document is that survey on industry work items. At the end of this survey a section on work item analysis is presented.
